user_query: I want to surprise my family with a vacation in Los Angeles and I need to find a suitable property for rent. Can you suggest some rental properties in Los Angeles that are family-friendly? Additionally, I would like to know the details of a specific property with ID 2625415443. Finally, I need information on cashback offers for hotels in Los Angeles. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Search for family-friendly rental properties in Los Angeles.
Retrieve details for the specific property with ID 2625415443.
Gather information on cashback offers for hotels in Los Angeles.
